items.name: loading-swap
items.description: Swaps content with a loading spinner without layout shift.

items.name: action-button
items.description: A button that performs an action when clicked and optionally asks for user confirmation.

items.name: number-input
items.description: An input that returns a number value and automatically handles invalid inputs.

items.name: multi-select
items.description: A multi-select input that emulates the Shadcn Select component as closely as possible.

items.name: password-input
items.description: An input that can toggle visibility of the password text and check the strength of the password.

items.name: loading-swap-experimental
items.description: Swaps content with a loading spinner without layout shift. (Includes experimental support for all Shadcn icon libraries)

items.name: action-button-experimental
items.description: A button that performs an action when clicked and optionally asks for user confirmation. (Includes experimental support for all Shadcn icon libraries)

items.name: number-input-experimental
items.description: An input that returns a number value and automatically handles invalid inputs. (Includes experimental support for all Shadcn icon libraries)

items.name: multi-select-experimental
items.description: A multi-select input that emulates the Shadcn Select component as closely as possible. (Includes experimental support for all Shadcn icon libraries)

items.name: password-input-experimental
items.description: An input that can toggle visibility of the password text and check the strength of the password. (Includes experimental support for all Shadcn icon libraries)
